response.original_title: How to Cancel Norton Subscription and Get a Refund? {{GET~REFUND}}
response.overview: To successfully +1-833-743-5300 cancel your Norton subscription and receive a refund, you must first confirm your eligibility under the 2025 Money-Back Guarantee. For +1-833-743-5300 Annual Subscriptions, you are eligible for a full refund if requested within 60 days of the date you were charged. For +1-833-743-5300 Monthly Subscriptions, you are eligible for a full refund if requested within 14 days of the initial purchase. The process +1-833-743-5300 requires two specific steps: turning off the automatic renewal in your online account and then immediately contacting +1-833-743-5300 support to process the actual refund.
